results.title: Inhibitory effect of simvastatin on the proliferation of human myeloid leukaemia cells in severe combined immunodeficient (SCID) mice.
results.text_hl: Inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the proliferation of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Leukemia_T_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D015458 @@@myeloid leukaemia@@@ cells in @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Combined_Immunodeficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016511 @@@severe combined immunodeficient@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Severe_Combined_Immunodeficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016511 @@@SCID@@@) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Clutterbuck RD, Millar BC, Powles RL, Newman A, Catovsky D, Jarman M, Millar JL. Inhibitory effect of simvastatin on the proliferation of human myeloid leukaemia cells in severe combined immunodeficient (SCID) mice. Br J Haematol. 1998 Jul;102(2):522-7. PMID: 9695968

results.title: Simvastatin Promotes Dental Pulp Stem Cell-induced Coronal Pulp Regeneration in Pulpotomized Teeth.
results.text_hl: In addition, DPSCs pretreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were transplanted into the dorsum of @CELLLINE_CVCL:U652 @@@CB-17@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Combined_Immunodeficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016511 @@@severe combined immunodeficiency@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Jia W, Zhao Y, Yang J, Wang W, Wang X, Ling L, Ge L. Simvastatin Promotes Dental Pulp Stem Cell-induced Coronal Pulp Regeneration in Pulpotomized Teeth. J Endod. 2016 Jul;42(7):1049-54. PMID: 27207592

results.title: HMG CoA reductase inhibitors (statins) to treat Epstein-Barr virus-driven lymphoma
results.text_hl: Studies in @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Combined_Immunodeficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016511 @@@severe combined immunodeficiency@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ delays the development of @DISEASE_Epstein_Barr_Virus_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D020031 @@@EBV-lymphomas@@@ in these animals.

citations.NLM: Cohen JI. HMG CoA reductase inhibitors (statins) to treat Epstein-Barr virus-driven lymphoma Br J Cancer. 2005 May 9;92(9):1593-8. PMID: 15856040
citations.BibTeX: @article{15856040, title={HMG CoA reductase inhibitors (statins) to treat Epstein-Barr virus-driven lymphoma}, author={Cohen JI}, journal={Br J Cancer}, volume={92}, number={9}, pages={1593-8}}

results.title: Simvastatin induces apoptosis of Epstein-Barr virus (EBV)-transformed lymphoblastoid cell lines and delays development of EBV lymphomas.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: Administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Combined_Immunodeficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016511 @@@severe combined immunodeficiency@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ followed by inoculation with LCLs resulted in delayed development of @DISEASE_Epstein_Barr_Virus_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D020031 @@@EBV lymphomas@@@ and prolonged survival of animals.

citations.NLM: Katano H, Pesnicak L, Cohen JI. Simvastatin induces apoptosis of Epstein-Barr virus (EBV)-transformed lymphoblastoid cell lines and delays development of EBV lymphomas. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2004 Apr 6;101(14):4960-5. PMID: 15041742
citations.BibTeX: @article{15041742, title={Simvastatin induces apoptosis of Epstein-Barr virus (EBV)-transformed lymphoblastoid cell lines and delays development of EBV lymphomas.}, author={Katano H and Pesnicak L and Cohen JI}, journal={Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A}, volume={101}, number={14}, pages={4960-5}}
